statements: SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations;
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_date FROM policy_evaluations;
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_score FROM policy_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations WHERE policy_name = 'Policy_A' AND evaluation_score > 8.0;
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_score FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC
SELECT AVG(evaluation_score) AS average_score, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS total_evaluations FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_date FROM policy_evaluations WHERE policy_name LIKE '%health%' ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_result FROM policy_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT id, assessment_date, assessment_result FROM impact_assessments WHERE impact_id = 5;
SELECT id, policy_name, evaluation_result FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_result = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations WHERE policy_name = 'Policy A' ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_result FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY evaluation_date;
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND evaluation_result = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations INNER JOIN impact_assessments ON policy_evaluations.id = impact_assessments.impact_id WHERE assessment_result LIKE '%high%' AND evaluation_result = 'Failed';
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) as total_evaluations FROM policy_evaluations GROUP BY policy_name ORDER BY total_evaluations DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations;
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_date FROM policy_evaluations;
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_date, evaluator FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluation_result = 'Passed';
SELECT policy_owner_name, policy_owner_email FROM policy_owners;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_owners WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT policy_name, evaluation_date FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluator = 'John Doe';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_report FROM impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_owner_name, policy_owner_email FROM policy_owners WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY policy_owner_name ASC, policy_owner_email DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations JOIN impact_assessments ON policy_evaluations.evaluation_id = impact_assessments.assessed_policy_id WHERE policy_name LIKE '%security%'
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations;
SELECT id, policy_name FROM policy_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, evaluator_name, evaluation_date FROM policy_evaluations WHERE evaluator_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, impact_type, assessment_date FROM impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, result FROM policy_evaluations LEFT JOIN evaluation_results ON policy_evaluations.id = evaluation_results.evaluation_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_evaluations
SELECT id, policy_name, evaluation_date FROM policy_evaluations WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT impact_type, assessment_date FROM impact_assessments WHERE impact_type = 'Security' ORDER BY assessment_date ASC
SELECT pr.id, pr.role_name, er.result FROM policy_roles pr JOIN evaluation_results er ON pr.id = er.evaluation_id
SELECT * FROM evaluation_reports;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_type FROM evaluation_reports WHERE score > 3.5;
SELECT evaluator_id, evaluator_name, evaluator_email FROM evaluators ORDER BY evaluator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessments WHERE impact_factor BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT policy_description FROM policy_areas WHERE policy_area_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM evaluation_reports ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_type, score FROM evaluation_reports WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT e.evaluator_name, e.evaluator_email, COUNT(er.evaluation_id) AS evaluation_count FROM evaluators e JOIN evaluation_reports er ON e.evaluator_id = er.evaluator_id GROUP BY e.evaluator_id ORDER BY evaluation_count DESC;

SELECT ea.assessment_date, ea.assessed_entity, ei.evaluation_score, ei.impact_score FROM impact_assessments ea JOIN evaluations_impacts ei ON ea.assessment_id = ei.assessment_id ORDER BY ea.assessment_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT pc.policy_area_name, pc.policy_description, ec.comment_text FROM policy_areas pc JOIN evaluation_comments ec ON pc.policy_area_id = ec.evaluation_id WHERE ec.evaluator_id = 3 ORDER BY pc.policy_area_name ASC;
